title: Steel hasta

properties.name: description
properties.value: The steel hasta is a one-handed melee members weapon, similar to the spear. To wield this weapon the player needs at least 5 Attack and Barbarian Training in Smithing. To obtain a steel hasta the player can either create one using the Smithing skill or trade with another player. It can be poisoned.

The steel hasta is a one-handed melee members weapon, similar to the spear. To wield this weapon the player needs at least 5 Attack and Barbarian Training in Smithing. To obtain a steel hasta the player can either create one using the Smithing skill or trade with another player. It can be poisoned.

UnpoisonedPoisonPoison+
Poison++Karambwan poison

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

21 April 2021
(update)

The hasta's attack speed has been decreased from 5 (every 3.0 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).

The '''steel hasta''' is a one-handed [[melee]] [[members]] [[weapon]], similar to the [[spear]]. To wield this weapon the player needs at least 5 [[Attack]] and [[Barbarian Training]] in [[Smithing]]. To obtain a steel hasta the player can either create one using the [[Smithing]] skill or trade with another player. It can be [[poison]]ed.
